笼子里的囚犯是一个玩家角色的堕落克隆体，一眼就能看出是这样。它是由其中一个巫婆在角色睡觉时获得的血液或头发丝创造出来的。角色有一点机会遇到女巫，作为随机的野外遭遇（见{@adventure appendix B|ToA|7}）；但是，何时何地发生盗窃，则取决于你。
克隆人不是一个完美的副本。它比它所模仿的人物更矮更潦倒，而且有畸形。使用{@creature commoner}的统计数字来表示这种生物，适当地应用种族特征。
克隆人没有名字，也不记得自己被创造过。然而，女巫们在克隆人和制造它的角色之间建立了一种神奇的联系。克隆人知道这个角色所知道的一切，包括所有目前的知识。巫师们一直在审问克隆人，以了解关于冒险者的一切。现在她们对这些信息已经没有用处了，缝纫修女们计划杀死并吃掉这个克隆体。

entries.name: Cauldron
entries: 青铜大锅中充满了焦油状的绿黑色酒液。任何喝了这种酒的生物都会在{@condition stunned}的时间内变成{@dice 1d10}。当{@condition stunned}时，该生物会因阿托帕尔的黑暗梦境所带来的痉挛而倒下。
大锅的青铜盖子就在附近的地上。如果把盖子放在大锅上，充满房间的绿烟会在1分钟后消散。

entries.name: Skeleton Gate
entries: 当人物靠近到足以看清绿门的细节时，读。
这扇十二英尺高、十英尺宽的门是由绿色的石头制成的，其表面雕刻着咧嘴笑的妖精骷髅。一条光滑的石带横跨在门的四英尺高处，上面镶嵌着一排五个金色符号：一个三角形、一个正方形、一个五边形、一个六边形和一个八边形。每个符号都被刻在一个凹陷的圆形印章上。

The geometric symbols are 6 inches across, 1 foot apart, and set into stone disks 8 inches in diameter. Hidden behind the seals are five keyholes that conform in size and shape to the heads of the skeleton keys found on the other tomb levels (see "{@area Skeleton Keys|316|x}").

Each time the characters complete a trial in areas 72 through 76, one stone seal rolls aside, exposing the keyhole behind it. When a {@creature skeleton key|ToA} is inserted into its corresponding keyhole and turned clockwise, a tumbler inside the door unlocks. When all five tumblers unlock, the skeleton gate can be pulled open like a normal (albeit heavy) door, revealing a wide staircase that descends 20 feet to {@area area 77|4fa|x}. The door and its seals are impervious to damage and spells, and cannot be opened in a manner other than that which is prescribed above.

entries.name: Facing the Night Hags
entries: If the characters manage to open all five keyholes and have the requisite skeleton keys in their possession, the Sewn Sisters emerge from the Border Ethereal and attack them. The hags' goal is to seize one or more of the skeleton keys, thus preventing the characters from reaching the Soulmonger. If a hag obtains a {@creature skeleton key|ToA}, it cackles as it returns to the Border Ethereal with it.

If two hags die, the third tries to bargain with the characters, offering useful information in exchange for her life. The hag makes the characters swear on their mortal souls not to harm her once her information is divulged. Any character who reneges on the agreement contracts slimy doom, as though he or she had failed a saving throw against the {@spell contagion} spell. The hag reveals the following information (and nothing more) once an agreement is reached:

items: "在地牢的这一层隐藏着一个失落传说的图书馆，由一个真名为Ygga Raxyg的弓箭手守护着。" (详情见{@area area 80|51c|x}。)
"只有一条路可以离开地牢：乌骨池。烧焦的骨头指明了方向。" (参见{@area area 81|520|x}，了解有关乌骨池的详情。"烧焦的骨头 "指的是{@area area 79|512|x}中地板上的烧焦的骨架。）
"红色小路通向死亡"。(见{@area area 79|512|x}。)

entries.name: 72. Trial of the Triangle
entries: 通往这个区域的门上刻有一个三角形的图案。当人物打开门时，请阅读。
靠近这个房间后墙的一个五英尺宽的落地玻璃缸里充满了光，其来源并不明显。在玻璃上开了一个小小的三角孔，离地面五英尺高。在圆筒内，一个铁制杠杆被镶嵌在地板上的金属板上。
为了到达杠杆，人物必须想办法进入或绕过圆筒。如果拉动杠杆，{@area area 71|4d8|x}的骷髅门上的三角形封条会滚到一边，露出后面的三角形钥匙孔。

The cylinder is 5 feet in diameter, shaped of glass 2 inches thick. The triangular hole in the glass is 1 inch wide. The cylinder is normally impervious to damage and spells, and it can't be moved. A character in {@spell gaseous form} can enter the cylinder through the hole, while an ethereal character can pass through the glass. A character can also use {@spell misty step}, {@spell dimension door}, or similar magic to enter the cylinder. A magically summoned creature can appear inside the cylinder, as can an {@spell unseen servant}, either of which can be commanded to pull the lever. The lever is too heavy to be moved with a {@spell mage hand} spell but responds to a {@spell telekinesis} spell.
如果有三个生物站在玻璃缸周围，在它周围形成三角形的各点，玻璃缸就会变脆，任何坚固的撞击都能将其击碎。一旦圆柱体被摧毁，任何人都可以走到杠杆前拉动它。

entries.name: 73. Trial of the Square
entries: 通往这个区域的门上刻着一个正方形。当人物打开门时，请读。
这个房间里到处都是飞舞的羊皮纸，纸页上的文字在飘过时清晰可见。栓在远处墙上的一块金属板上设置了一个幽灵般的杠杆。

The flying pages are from a spellbook and are destroyed if they take any amount of fire damage. A character can use an action to grab a page as it flutters past with a successful DC 10 Dexterity check. Written on the page is a random spell; roll a {@dice d6} to determine the spell's level, then randomly choose a spell of that level from the wizard spell list.

If more than three pages are taken, all the remaining pages in the room turn to dust, which coalesces into a hostile {@creature dust mephit} and three illusory duplicates created by a {@spell mirror image} spell. The mephit attacks all other creatures in the room, with its duplicates appearing to follow suit.
梅菲特知道三个命令词。"bloatbug"、"frogspittle "和 "spindledash"。在这个房间里，它可以在自己的回合中说一个命令词作为额外动作，触发下面的相关魔法效果。它不能连续两轮说同一个命令词。
{@b Bloatbug}: 梅菲特以它能看到的30英尺范围内的一个生物为目标，使其体重立即增加50%。任何结束诅咒的法术，如{@spell greater restoration}或{@spell remove curse}，都会结束该效果并使该生物恢复到正常体重。
{@b Frogspittle}: 房间里的每一个生物都必须在DC10的宪法救赎中成功，否则就会受到9({@dice 2d8})的毒伤害。(Mephit对毒药伤害免疫。)

{@b Spindledash}: The effect targets a random creature in the room. Have the players roll a {@dice d20} for each character in the room, and roll a {@dice d20} for the mephit and each other creature in the room. Whichever creatures roll the lowest take 21 ({@dice 6d6}) force damage.
当灰尘梅菲特死亡时，它就会倒下，变成一根黑粉笔。

entries.name: Phantom Lever
entries: 北面墙上的杠杆是由骨头雕刻而成的，但是没有实体，所以角色的手可以直接穿过它。对虚空界的生物来说，这个杆子看起来很坚固，虚空界的生物可以正常拉动它。{@spell Dispel magic}对杠杆没有影响，即使在{@spell antimagic field}的范围内，它仍然是无实体的。如果任何生物用粉笔在杠杆周围的墙上画一个正方形，杠杆就会变成实体。如果这个方块被擦掉，杠杆就会再次变成无实体的。
如果拉动杠杆，{@area area 71|4d8|x}的骷髅门上的方形封条就会滚到一边，露出后面的一个方形钥匙孔。

entries.name: 74. Trial of the Pentagon
entries: 这个区域的门上刻着一个五边形。当人物打开门时，请阅读。
五香肉的美味香气迎面而来。在一条二十英尺长的走廊尽头，打开一个房间，墙上挂着红色的挂毯。三张桌子上摆着一桌宴席，包括烤野猪肉、炖南瓜和一盘冰蛋糕。旗子上的泡沫啤酒使宴会更加完美。
一个身着尘土飞扬的黑色西装的憔悴的人类男性，静静地摆放着蛋糕桌上的物品，注意到你的闯入。他一言不发，打着手势让你上前品尝盛宴。
这位憔悴的先生是{@creature Mister Threadneedle|ToA}，缝纫姐妹的男仆。一个{@spell detect magic}的法术或类似的效果在他周围显示出一个幻觉魔法的光环。一个成功的{@spell dispel magic}(DC16)会显示他的真实形态。

{@creature Mister Threadneedle|ToA}是一个用魔法伪装成人类的{@creature scarecrow}。他的口袋里装着缝纫姐妹的{@i hag eye}（见{@i Monster Manual}中的 "女巫 "条目）和一颗有光泽的黑色大理石（见{@area area 81|520|x}）。{@creature Mister Threadneedle|ToA}能听懂普通话，但不能说话。他通过点头和摇头，或用手势和面部表情进行交流。

Warned of the adventurers' arrival, the hags prepared this magical feast and instructed {@creature Mister Threadneedle|ToA} to lay it out. The scarecrow attacks the characters only if they attack first, or if the hags command him to.

entries.name: Advice from the Spirits
entries: 任何由库巴赞或南宫的灵魂居住的角色在进入这个区域时都会收到建议。

items: 野生的库巴赞敦促他的主人尝试烤野猪肉。
贪婪、胆小的南宫敦促她的主人囤积所有的冰蛋糕，避开有泡沫的啤酒。

entries.name: Magical Feast
entries: 食物准备得很好，很美味，啤酒也很丰富。任何参加盛宴的角色都会根据所吃的东西获得好处和受到不利的影响。在这些影响出现之前，不要向玩家透露有害的影响。
{@b Roast Boar}: 人物感觉更强壮，在力量检查上有优势，但在对Widow Groat的攻击卷上有劣势。两个效果的持续时间都是24小时。
{@b Squash Stew}: 人物感觉更健康，并在体质测试中获得优势，但在对佩吉-死铃的攻击卷轴上有劣势。两个效果的持续时间都是24小时。
{@b Iced Cakes}: 角色感到精力充沛，并获得{@dice 2d10}临时命中率，但在接下来的24小时内，对巴格-南娜的攻击卷轴有劣势。

{@b Frothy Beer}: The character gains a special die: a {@dice d6}. Anytime in the next 24 hours, the character can roll this die once and add the result to a {@dice d20} roll he or she just made. Additionally, if the character is inhabited by the spirit of a trickster god, the power normally granted by the spirit is suppressed for 24 hours.

Characters who enter the room but do not partake of the food or drink are cursed with crippling hunger as soon as they leave this area. The effect imposes disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and it can be ended on a character with {@spell greater restoration}, {@spell remove curse}, or similar magic.

entries.name: Tapestries
entries: 五幅红色挂毯挂在栓在墙上的铁杆上。每一块都是由五边形的补丁缝合而成。任何检查西南墙上的挂毯并成功通过DC15智慧({@skill Perception})检查的人物都会看到更多的东西：一张潜意识的魔鬼的脸巧妙地隐藏在设计中。恶魔张开的嘴形成一个五边形。一个角色可以把手伸进魔鬼的嘴里，就像布料不在那里一样，揭开一个小的超维空间，后面有一个玻璃杠杆。这个隔间只能从挂毯的正面进入，而且只能在挂毯挂在墙上时进入。如果挂毯被带出房间或被毁坏，在(1%)小时内会有一个新的挂毯出现在墙上。
如果拉动挂毯上的杠杆，{@area area 71|4d8|x}的骷髅门上的五边形封条就会滚到一边，露出后面的五边形钥匙孔。

entries.name: 75. Trial of the Hexagon
entries: 这个房间的门上刻着一个六边形。当人物打开门时，请读。
一面裂开的六面大镜子被安装在对面墙上突出的石架子上面。架子上立着五根未点燃的蜡烛，每根蜡烛都是用黄蜡制成，上面布满了细小的黑色符号。镜子上方的墙壁上用干涸的血迹写着 "小猪小猪小猪 "的字样。

A sixth candle, identical to the five in plain view, is tucked out of sight under the stone shelf. Any character who searches the shelf for traps or hidden compartments automatically finds the sixth candle. Both the mirror and the candles radiate auras of conjuration magic to a {@spell detect magic} spell or similar effect.

entries.name: Cracked Mirror
entries: 裂开的镜子不能从墙上撬开，也不能比现在损坏得更严重。
如果六根蜡烛都被点燃了，对着镜子连续说了三次 "小猪 "这个词的人，会看到反射的烛光显示出一个镶嵌在北墙的金属板上的木质杠杆。如果说这句话时点燃的蜡烛少于六根，杠杆就会出现在南墙上。这些杠杆只存在于镜子的反射中，不存在于现实中。
只有能看到镜子中反射的杠杆的角色才能拉动它。由于这可能会使杠杆超出人物的能力范围，他或她可以施展一个{@spell mage hand}或{@spell telekinesis}的法术，变出一个{@spell unseen servant}，用绳子套住杠杆，或采取任何适当的巧妙的解决办法。

entries.name: True Lever
entries: 如果拉动北面的杠杆，{@area area 71|4d8|x}的骷髅门上的六边形封条会滚到一边，露出后面的六边形钥匙孔。

entries.name: False Lever
entries: If the south lever is pulled, three insane {@creature Wereboar||wereboars} in hybrid form magically spring from the mirror, land in the middle of the room, and fight to the death. When the wereboars have nothing left in the room to fight, they join the night hags in {@area area 71|4d8|x}.
狼人只能被召唤一次。再次拉动这个杠杆没有任何效果。

entries.name: 76. Trial of the Octagon
entries: 这个房间的门上刻着一个八角形。当人物打开门时，请读。
这个石膏墙的房间的天花板有15英尺高。一本皮制的书在一个栓在地板上的木制讲台上打开。讲台后面的墙上摆放着八具人体骨骼，排列整齐，看起来就像在坠落和尖叫。

The skeletons are inanimate remains embedded into the plastered walls. The lectern is held in place by four bolts set deep into the floor and is impervious to damage, spells, and attempts to move it. The book's covers are secured to the lectern with {@i sovereign glue}, preventing it from being easily removed. The eight-page book contains an eight-line nursery rhyme written by the Sewn Sisters in Infernal, with each page bearing one line of the poem. The book is open to pages 4 and 5 when the characters first arrive.
在讲台的腿上，面向东墙的一侧，隐藏着一个秘密的隔间，只要成功地进行DC10智慧({@skill Perception})检查就可以找到。
如果把童谣（见下文）的句子按相反的顺序朗读，从最后一句开始，到第一句结束，密室的门就会打开，露出里面的铜质杠杆。如果拉动杠杆，{@area area 71|4d8|x}的骷髅门上的八角形封条会滚到一边，露出后面的八角形钥匙孔。
这个隔间也可以用{@spell knock}的法术打开，或者由使用盗贼工具的角色成功地进行DC20灵巧检查。以这两种方式打开隔间都会触发陷阱（见下面的 "蜘蛛扇陷阱"）。

entries.name: Nursery Rhyme Book
entries: 任何懂得地狱之语的人物都可以将女巫的童谣翻译如下。
{@b Page 1}: 往后，往后，八比一。
{@b Page 2}: 说韵文，直到完成。
{@b Page 3}: 把蜘蛛关起来。
{@b Page 4}: 看到杠杆，清晰无比。
{@b Page 5}: 旋转，旋转，铁蜘蛛。
{@b Page 6}: 把他们的肉和骨头变成苹果酒。
{@b Page 7}: 说出韵律，迎接你的命运。
{@b Page 8}: 前进，前进，一到八。

entries.name: Spider Fan Trap
entries: 任何检查房间地板并成功通过DC15智慧({@skill Perception})检查的角色都会注意到沿着地板周边的细缝，暗示下面有一个坑。这些细缝是为了欺骗冒险者，让他们对地板保持警惕，因为地板下面实际上并没有坑。
真正危险的是天花板，它看起来是光滑切割的石头，但实际上是薄薄的石膏。在假石膏天花板上方五英尺处是房间的真正天花板，上面安装着一个形似巨大铁蜘蛛的叶片风扇。

If a character in the room reads the entire nursery rhyme beginning with the first line on page 1 and ending with the last line on page 8, or if the compartment in the lectern is opened improperly, the ceiling fan begins to twirl as a {@spell reverse gravity} spell activates within the room. The lectern is the only fixed object in the room. Any creature within reach of it can, with a successful DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, grab the lectern and avoid falling upward. A creature that can't grab the lectern or isn't secured in some other way "falls" upward through the fake plaster ceiling into the rotating blades of the fan, taking 44 ({@dice 8d10}) slashing damage. The creature takes that damage again each time it starts its turn on the ceiling. The {@spell reverse gravity} effect lasts for 1 minute, after which creatures on the ceiling fall back down to the floor 20 feet below. Once the spell ends, the ceiling fan stops twirling. The trap does not reset.

entries.name: 77. Death God's Nursery
entries: 打开{@area area 71|4d8|x}的骷髅门，可以看到一个10英尺宽、20英尺长的黑色抛光大理石的楼梯，可以下到这个区域。当人物到达楼梯底部时，请阅读。
碎裂的阳台俯瞰着填满这个三角形房间的熔岩池，上面悬挂着一个巨大的水晶圆柱体，由三根金刚砂支柱固定。巫师般的形态在圆筒内旋转，另一个世界的尖叫声在空中回荡。四条长长的、蠕动的触角从圆筒的盖子上伸出来。一个像大象一样大小的干瘪怪物漂浮在圆柱体附近。它的身体是湿的、畸形的，它的胳膊和腿是萎缩的，它的超大的头滴着黑色的粘液。这个生物通过一条扭曲的脐带连接到圆筒上。

这个圆柱形的装置是 "灵魂使者"。漂浮在它旁边的畸形生物是{@creature atropal|ToA}（见{@adventure appendix D|ToA|9}），它以捕获的死者灵魂为食。阿托帕尔会攻击任何威胁到它或试图破坏其食物来源的生物。如果阿托帕尔死了，{@creature Acererak|ToA}会来报仇（见下文"{@area Acererak's Revenge|507|x}"）。
金库的天花板有30英尺高，沿着北面阳台的墙壁上有很多凹槽，里面堆放着头骨和骨头--老奥姆人和他们的牛头人保护者的遗体。

entries.name: Advice from the Spirits
entries: 任何被诡计多端的灵魂居住的角色在进入这个区域时都会得到建议。

items: 善变的伊金鼓励她的主人去调查南边阳台上充满迷雾的拱门（见下文 "迷雾之门"）。
富有冒险精神的库巴赞期望他的主人做出最终的牺牲，并在荣耀中死去。
仁慈的莫阿想释放被困在灵魂之门内的灵魂。
贪婪的南宫敦促她的主人在阳台和充满骨头的洞穴里寻找宝藏。
紧张的奥博拉卡担心北部凹槽里的骨头可能会起来攻击。
精明的帕帕佐特尔怀疑阿托帕尔可能容易受到辐射伤害，杀死它可能会召唤出它的邪恶主人。
善良的沙甘比认识到阿托品是不神圣的，并命令她的主人立即将其销毁。
沉思的翁赫敦促她的主人与阿托帕尔沟通。也许这个生物只是被误解了。
精神错乱的Wongo想让他的主人攻击从灵魂魔王顶部长出的触手。

entries.name: The Soulmonger
entries: 灵魂使者是一个直立的水晶圆柱，高20英尺，直径10英尺。将其悬挂在熔岩之上的金刚砂支柱连接到圆柱体中间的金刚砂环上。
在{@spell detect magic}法术或类似效果的监视下，灵魂制造者会放射出强烈的亡灵魔法光环。摧毁Soulmonger不仅可以结束死亡诅咒的影响（见冒险介绍），还可以释放所有被困在装置中的灵魂。被释放的灵魂会前往来世，而任何灵魂被释放的生物都可以通过魔法手段起死回生。
灵魂使者是一件邪恶的神器--一个巨大的物体，AC值为15；200点命中率；易受辐射伤害；对非魔法攻击的击打、穿刺和切割伤害免疫。

entries.name: Adamantine Struts
entries: 摧毁灵魂使者的方法之一是打破悬挂在熔岩上的三根金刚砂支柱。每个支柱都是一个大型物体，AC值为20；100点命中率；对非魔法攻击的击打、穿刺和砍击伤害免疫；对火、毒和精神伤害免疫。当一根支杆的命中率降至0时，它就会断裂，并导致另外两根支杆在灵魂使者下落时断裂。
支杆足够宽，中型或小型生物可以毫无困难地沿着它们行走。然而，任何生物在站在支杆上时受到伤害，都必须在DC10的灵巧救赎中获得成功，否则就会掉下来，坠入岩浆中，除非该生物以某种方式得到保护。
除非有同样的保护措施，任何站在金刚砂支杆上的生物在支杆断裂时都会落入熔岩中。如果该生物在阳台的范围内，它可以跳到阳台上，并通过成功的DC10灵巧反射来避免坠落。

entries.name: Tentacles
entries: 每回合一次，在任何生物对圆柱体或它的一个支杆进行成功的近战武器攻击时，灵魂使者会用它的一个30英尺长的触手攻击该生物。该触手的力量值为22，对该生物进行一次近战武器攻击。命中率+7，造成24({@dice 4d8 + 6})重击伤害。触手可以抓住它的目标，而不是造成伤害（逃脱DC 16）。如果目标的重量在330磅以下，触手还可以举起{@condition grappled}生物并将其移动到其30英尺范围内任何无人的空间，或者将其丢入熔岩中。
这些触手可以被攻击和摧毁。每一个都是一个巨大的动画物体，AC15，30点，对毒药和精神伤害免疫。

entries.name: Destroying the Soulmonger
entries: 当灵魂使者的命中率降至0时，读。
水晶圆柱体碎裂，无数的小光从里面涌出。这些明亮的灵魂像龙卷风一样在空中盘旋，向上燃烧，然后在一个刺眼的幽灵般的闪光中消失了。
如果阿托帕尔没有被摧毁，当死者的灵魂从灵魂使者的残骸中逃脱时，它就会发出尖叫。

entries.name: Lava Pit
entries: The lava pit is 30 feet below the floor of the room and 100 feet deep. Any creature that falls into the lava or starts its turn there takes 55 ({@dice 10d10}) fire damage. Any object that falls into the lava takes damage on initial contact and once per round thereafter until it is removed from the lava or destroyed.

entries.name: Phylacteries
entries: 沿着密室的东墙和西墙，两个阳台站在熔岩坑上方30英尺处。
沿着房间一半的两个朝向阳台，到处都是华丽的玻璃瓶、有凹槽的银瓮、象牙匣子和其他容器--它们都刻有邪恶的符号。
{@creature Acererak|ToA}的弟子散布在整个多元宇宙，包括许多试图成为像他一样强大的地衣。他把他们的法器放在这里。
每个阳台上都有{@dice 2d6 + 5}蜥蜴人的法器。任何通过DC15智力测试成功的人物都能认出这些法器的真面目。摧毁一个法器不是简单的任务，通常需要一个特殊的仪式、物品或武器。这里的法器都是独一无二的，发现每一个法器的破坏关键需要时间和昂贵的研究。把这些法器扔进熔岩中，有10%的可能性会被摧毁。

entries.name: Mist Gate
entries: 房间南端的阳台上有通往九神之墓最后房间的大门。
一个华丽的拱门笼罩着这个阳台。大笑的骷髅头被塑造成它的框架，发光的雾气在里面翻腾着。

A {@spell detect magic} spell or similar effect reveals an aura of conjuration magic around the gate. Any creature that steps into the archway emerges from a similar archway in {@area area 78|50d|x}, along with anything it is wearing or carrying.

entries.name: Acererak's Revenge
entries: 如果人物杀死了阿托帕尔，请阅读。
一个裹在发霉的长袍里的骷髅头出现在南边的阳台上，手里握着一根带着头骨的法杖。憎恨的白光针尖在它的眼窝里燃烧，一个直径两英尺的完全黑暗的球体漂浮在它旁边的空中。

{@creature Acererak|ToA}(见{@adventure appendix D|ToA|9})卷起主动权，用他所有的力量进行攻击，希望能杀死入侵者，收获他们的灵魂。大祭司带着{@item Staff of the Forgotten One|ToA}(见{@adventure appendix C|ToA|8})，身边有一个{@item sphere of annihilation}，他用戴在脖子上的{@item talisman of the sphere}来控制它。因为九神之墓不是{@creature Acererak|ToA}的家，所以他在这场战斗中无法获得巢穴行动。
{@creature Acererak|ToA}用居高临下的语气对冒险者说话，称他们为 "微不足道的凡人"，并着手摧毁他们。

entries.name: Wrath of the Trickster Gods
entries: When {@creature Acererak|ToA} appears, any character inhabited by the spirit of a trickster god hears that spirit cry out for vengeance. In addition to the power granted by his or her trickster god, the character gains the following benefits while he or she can see {@creature Acererak|ToA}:

items: 角色在每个回合开始时获得50个临时打击点。
当角色对{@creature Acererak|ToA}进行攻击并击中时，攻击会造成额外的{@dice 3d6}精神伤害。

entries.name: Acererak's Defeat
entries: 如果{@creature Acererak|ToA}的命中率降到100以下，他在下一回合施放{@spell teleport}，然后逃离。当他离开时，请读。
"我们会再见面的，傻瓜！"巫师说。"在那一天，你会死！" 就这样，{@creature Acererak|ToA}举起他的法杖，说了一些神秘的音节，然后就走了。
如果在他有机会逃跑之前，人物成功地杀死了{@creature Acererak|ToA}，请阅读。
巫师的脸上掠过一丝恐怖的神情，他的身体变成了灰尘。他破烂的长袍掉在地上，他的法杖和护身符也是如此。
{@creature Acererak|ToA}的身体在他的法器附近进行改造，法器被藏在某个遥远的半位面，但他的财产却被留下来供人物偷窃。在有人用护身符控制它之前，(1%)保持静止不动。因为它不是生物，所以如果它进入雾门（见上文 "雾门"），球体就不会被传送。

entries.name: 78. Chapel of Hate
entries: 任何通过{@area area 77|4fa|x}的雾门的生物都会从这个房间南墙的一个类似拱门里出来。这道门也允许回到{@area area 77|4fa|x}。
你走出迷雾，进入一个有黑色玄武岩柱子和一个抛光黑曜石祭坛的地下小教堂。祭坛上放着一个皮包，大小和形状与人体一样，似乎是被缝上的。祭坛之外，一个拱门上挂着厚重的黑色帷幔。
八个憔悴的、绿色皮肤的生物被铐在小教堂的墙上，每个人都用一只可怕的眼睛望着你。这些怪物开始胡言乱语，流着口水，他们摇晃着他们的手铐，渴望获得自由。
一旦阿托帕尔吸食了足够多的灵魂，{@creature Acererak|ToA}计划用一个有价值的牺牲品的血对其进行洗礼。这座小教堂就是为这个黑暗仪式而建的。缝纫修女们获得了一个合适的牺牲品，并将其缝在了放在祭坛上的皮制尸袋内。

entries.name: Advice from the Spirits
entries: 任何被莫阿或旺格之灵居住的角色在进入这个区域时都会得到建议。

items: 善良的莫阿建议释放那些带着镣铐的生物。
暴力的Wongo敦促他的主人刺破尸袋，确保里面的东西都死了。

entries.name: Body Bag
entries: 皮包可以被剪开，露出一个{@condition unconscious}的囚犯，其身份由你决定。他可能是{@creature Artus Cimber|ToA}、{@creature Dragonbait|ToA}、Volothamp Geddarm，或其他一些人物没有机会见到的NPC。它也可能是在冒险过程中与队伍分离的NPC。

If no suitable NPC springs to mind, use a captured member of the Order of the Gauntlet named Zalder Faelrond (LG male Tethyrian human {@creature knight} of Torm, with no armor or weapons). Zalder's story is that he was kidnapped by the Sewn Sisters while patrolling the jungle. If set free, he requests an escort back to Camp Vengeance (see {@area chapter 2|0cd|x}).

The night hags' magic keeps the prisoner alive and {@condition unconscious}. With a successful DC 17 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana} or {@skill Religion}) check, a character determines that the effect can be ended only by splashing the prisoner with holy water.

entries.name: Devotees of Acererak
entries: The creatures shackled to the chapel walls are eight {@creature Nothic||nothics}—former disciples of {@creature Acererak|ToA} who lost their minds trying to learn their master's arcane secrets. The nothics are {@condition restrained} by the shackles and can't make melee attacks until they are set free. They speak Undercommon and demand to be released.

The night hag Widow Groat (see {@area area 71|4d8|x}) carries the keys to the nothics' shackles, which can also be picked with a successful DC 13 Dexterity check made by a character using thieves' tools, or sundered with a good, hard weapon strike.
如果人物不理会nothics的要求，这些可恶的生物就会用它们可怕的腐烂目光攻击他们。如果角色们解开他们的镣铐，nothics就会在小教堂里闲逛，并让他们独处。如果他们的解放者询问他们，他们还会提供以下有用的信息。

items: 如果角色们正在寻找通往坟墓的出口，一个人跳到黑幕前，把它拉到一边，指着北边的隧道（{@area area 79|512|x}），并（用暗语）喊道："注意骨头！"
如果人物在寻找宝藏，另一个nothic会执行与上述相同的行动，只是它要喊："跟着紫色的足迹走！"

entries.name: 79. Hall of Finality

entries: 帘子后面是一条十英尺宽、四十五英尺长的走廊，设置了四个装饰性拱门，拱门内有空白墙。三条用红色、金色和紫色瓷砖标出的道路沿着地板蜿蜒而行，每条道路都通向三个拱门中的一个。地板上的一具烧焦的骨架指向第四个拱门，它没有通往拱门的道路。
大厅远处的壁灯中燃烧着一支火炬。它的下面是一个铜牌，上面有一个普通的警告："看那些违抗我的人的命运！"
只要火把还在这个走廊里，就会一直点着，不会烧毁。如果从大厅里拿出来，它就会正常烧毁。

entries.name: Advice from the Spirits
entries: 任何由伊金或沙甘比的灵魂居住的角色在进入这个区域时都会收到建议。

items: 善变的伊金想让她的主人沿着紫色瓷砖的小路走，看看它通往哪里。(紫色是伊珍最喜欢的颜色，至少现在是这样）。
聪明的沙甘比敦促她的主人不要偏离瓦片小路。

entries.name: Charred Skeleton and Secret Door
entries: The charred skeleton points to the arch containing a secret door that slides open to reveal {@area area 81|520|x} beyond.

entries.name: Glyph of Warding
entries: 打开密门会触发一个{@spell glyph of warding}的法术，它的目标是以门为中心的20英尺半径的球体中的所有生物。这个球体在角落里扩散。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个DC24的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到22({@dice 5d8})的寒冷伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。触发的石刻在门的右下角，只要成功进行DC24智力检查就能找到。

entries.name: Wall of Fire
entries: 当{@spell glyph of warding}咒语激活或被驱散时，走廊的南端会涌现一道神奇的火墙，如果黑幕还挂在那里，就会把它点燃。火墙横跨大厅的宽度和高度。任何进入墙内的生物，在墙内开始其回合，或在墙的北侧5英尺范围内开始其回合，都会受到22（（1%））的火焰伤害。

When the wall of fire appears, all creatures present should roll initiative. Each round on initiative count 15, the wall moves 10 feet northward, stopping only when it reaches 5 feet from the north wall. The wall lasts until there are no creatures in the hallway, or until it is dispelled with a successful {@spell dispel magic} (DC 14).

entries.name: Golden Trail and Secret Door
entries: The trail of gold-colored tiles leads to the archway in the west wall that contains a secret door. Any character wearing the eye-shaped pendant found in {@area area 2|32f|x} can find the secret door without needing to make a check and can open the secret door without setting off the trap (see below). Behind the secret door is a dusty, web-filled hallway filled with sweet dulcimer music. The music gets louder as one approaches {@area area 80|51c|x}.

entries.name: Glyph of Warding
entries: 打开密门会触发一个{@spell glyph of warding}的法术，它的目标是以门为中心的20英尺半径的球体中的所有生物。这个球体在角落里扩散。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个DC24的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到22({@dice 5d8})的雷霆伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。触发的石刻在门的右下角，只要成功进行DC24智力检查就能找到。

entries.name: Purple Trail
entries: 一条由紫色瓷砖组成的小路通向大厅最北边的拱门。如果一个角色沿着这条小路走而不离开它，然后碰触到拱门内的墙壁，墙壁就会呈现出厚厚的泥浆，持续1小时。在这个效果持续期间，任何穿过墙壁的生物，或任何被推过墙壁的物体，都会以{@area area 80|51c|x}的速度从凹室的后墙出现。

entries.name: Red Trail
entries: The short trail of red-colored tiles ends in front of the hallway's southernmost arch. A creature that walks along the red trail without ever stepping off of it, then touches the wall within the archway, is pulled into the wall and unceremoniously dumped into {@area area 57|47d|x}.

entries.name: 80. Red Library
entries: 人物可以通过东边的隧道到达这里，如果他们激活了{@area area 79|512|x}的紫色小路拱门，也可以通过西南角的凹槽到达。
柔和的扬琴音乐充斥着这个房间，房间的墙壁被涂成了干血的颜色。墙上挂满了蜘蛛网和灰尘的书柜，房间中间有四个书柜。数以百计的皮制书籍压在其下垂的书架上。在房间的一端，一个小书房里有一把软垫皮椅、一个脚凳和一张小桌子--以及三具倒挂在北墙附近天花板上的脚镣和链条上的尸体。桌子上面放着一个灯笼状的装置，似乎是音乐的来源。一个老人躺在椅子上睡觉，他的角质眼镜滑落到鼻端。
图书馆里有一百位圣人的智慧结晶，还有一些法术书和卷轴（见下文 "宝藏"）。
沿着北墙悬挂的尸体是三个试图插手{@creature Acererak|ToA}事务的大法师的遗体。成功通过DC12智慧({@skill Medicine})检查，可以确认这三个人都是在过去一个月内死亡的，而且破坏性法术是他们死亡的原因。

睡在椅子上的老人是一个{@creature arcanaloth}受其{@spell alter self}法术影响的人。这个恶魔把图书馆的一本法术书打开放在腿上，假装睡着了。如果有人靠近，这个人似乎会醒来，并问道："你为什么打扰我？" 这个生物不会透露自己的真实姓名，而是称自己为 "狐狸先生"。弓箭手被{@creature Acererak|ToA}的魔法束缚在图书馆里，不能离开，也不允许图书馆的任何书籍或卷轴被移走。
如果任何角色在魔物的耳边说出阿卡纳罗斯的真名（"Ygga Raxyg"；见{@area area 71|4d8|x}），它就会被{@condition stunned}，持续1分钟。一旦{@condition stunned}的效果消失，在接下来的24小时内，重复阿卡纳罗斯的名字对它没有影响。如果被杀死，阿卡纳罗斯会融化成一滩血水，留下它的长袍和角质眼镜（见下文 "宝物"）。

entries.name: Alcove
entries: The alcove in the southwest corner of the room is empty. If the magic at the end of the purple trail is still active (see {@area area 79|512|x}), the back wall of the alcove has the consistency of thick mud. Any creature that passes through the wall, or any object pushed through the wall, emerges from the northernmost archway in {@area area 79|512|x}.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 阿卡纳罗斯的角质边框眼镜并不具有魔力，但它们价值250金币。这副眼镜也是一把门钥匙，可以打开Sigil平面城市的一个入口。这个传送门是一个通往阿卡迪亚位面的双向门。对眼镜施以{@spell legend lore}的法术，可以显示这些信息，如果卖给巫师或贤者，其潜在价值将提高到2500金币。

桌子上的东西是一个由深色木头制成的音乐盒，上面有金丝。一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语或类似的效果在它周围显示出一种魔法的光环。它的五面都雕刻着一个有角的女人的形象，她在演奏一种不同的乐器：扬琴、长笛、竖琴、里拉琴和小提琴。当触摸这个盒子时，生物可以使用一个动作使它演奏具有其中一种乐器的音乐，最远可以在60英尺外听到。角色也可以使用一个动作来停止音乐。这个音乐盒价值750戈比。

The library contains two hundred historical texts (50 gp each), sixty tomes of arcane lore (100 gp each), three dusty {@item Spell Scroll||spell scrolls} ({@spell create undead}, {@spell fabricate}, and {@spell resurrection}), and six spellbooks. The first three spellbooks contain {@dice 1d6} spells each of 1st through 3rd level. The fourth and fifth spellbooks contain {@dice 1d4} spells each of 4th through 6th level. The sixth spellbook has a title ({@i X the Mystic's Arcane Grimoire}) burned into its spine and contains {@dice 1d3} spells each of 7th through 9th level.

entries.name: 81. Ebon Pool

entries: 在这个寂静的密室中，一池漆黑的渗出物闪闪发光，其墙壁上有描绘黑色星星的浮雕。
池子里散发出一种魔法的光环，达到{@spell detect magic}的法术或类似效果。接触到黑泥的生物不会受到伤害。任何没有被生物佩戴或携带的物品，如果被淹没在黑泥中就会消失。这些物品会被永久遗失，被传送到一个秘密的半位面，其位置无法被探测到。从池中移出的任何数量的渗出物都会立即消失。

entries.name: Activating the Pool
entries: Peggy Deadbells（在{@area area 71|4d8|x}）和{@creature Mister Threadneedle|ToA}（在{@area area 74|4eb|x}）手中有黑色的弹珠，可以用来激活水池。如果这些黑色弹珠中的一个被扔进池子里，读。
黑色的大理石沉入渗出物中，渗出物突然升起，形成一个四英尺高的黑色方尖碑--站在墓穴入口外的方尖碑的缩影。
任何接触到渗水方尖碑的生物都会被传送，连同它所穿戴和携带的所有物品，被传送到墓穴入口外方尖碑10英尺内的一个无人空间（{@area area 1|32a|x}）。这个效果不受阻止传送法术在墓穴内运作的魔法防护措施的影响。
渗水方尖碑沉入水池，1分钟后消失。将另一块黑色大理石扔进池子里，方尖碑就会重新出现。

entries.name: Conclusion
entries: 摧毁灵魂制造者可以释放被困在里面的灵魂，并结束{@creature Acererak|ToA}的死亡诅咒。完成这一目标的角色将拯救许多人的生命，如果他们的英雄事迹传开了，富有的和有影响力的NPC就会带着感谢的礼物前来。这些礼物可以有多种形式，包括土地和特殊的恩惠（见《{@i Dungeon Master's Guide}》第七章的"{@book Marks of Prestige|DMG|7|Marks of Prestige}"）。如果人物允许阿托帕尔在坟墓深处生存，它最终会吸引虚无主义的{@creature Acererak|ToA}信徒，他们把自己的黑暗灵魂作为养料喂给它。

entries.name: Lost Treasures
entries: 在探索坟墓的过程中，人物可能会发现一个或多个传说中的宝物，以及由Omu死去的诡计多端的神的灵魂居住的魔法物品。当人物离开古墓时，这些物品会发生什么，将在下面讨论。

entries.name: Relics of the Past
entries: {@creature Acererak|ToA}在墓中放置了四件宝物作为诱饵：黑蛋白冠，扎尔泰克之眼，月之脐，以及Ch'gakare的头骨圣杯。这些物品可以保留，也可以卖给感兴趣的买家，或者归还给他们的合法主人。

entries.name: Black Opal Crown (Area 49)
entries: 奥姆的元老们都在追求这个宝藏。如果他们不能从人物手中夺取它，他们就会试图从人物卖给的人那里购买或偷取王冠。王冠是否有能力释放夜蛇丹达，这取决于你。如果王冠落入坏人之手，人物可能需要冒险进入火焰之峰下面的洞穴，在世界末日之前取回它。

entries.name: Eye of Zaltec (Area 62)
entries: 黄旗军团为了得到这颗失落的宝石而被征服，据传这颗宝石有复活古代死者的力量。如果扎尔泰克之眼确实有这样的力量，它需要大量的牺牲才能发挥作用。塔巴西族的盗贼可能会试图偷走这颗宝石，并把它安全地带回马兹提卡，也许可以用它来换取被奴役的亲人的释放。相反，一个恶棍可能会买下这颗宝石，用它来复活一个死去的暴君、一个邪恶的大法师，或者一些更大的威胁。

entries.name: Navel of the Moon (Area 56)
entries: 如果角色试图在Baldur's Gate、Port Nyanzaru或其他城市出售这块石头，出售的消息很快就会传到富有的Calishite商人的耳中。一场竞价战可能会接踵而至，也可能会有刺客被派去取回石头并悄悄地处理掉它的新主人。这块石头是否具有所谓的让被时间和命运分开的家庭重新团聚的力量，完全取决于你。

entries.name: Skull Chalice of Ch'gakare (Area 67)
entries: Mwaxanaré公主付不起这个宝物的价值，她会鄙视他们把它卖给别人。尼安扎鲁港的三位商人王子表示有兴趣购买这个圣杯。{@creature Ifan Talro'a|ToA}想把它加入他的苏丹遗物的私人收藏中，Kwayothé想把它融化，{@creature Zhanthi|ToA}出于感情上的考虑想要它。拒绝他们中的任何一个人都是一个严重的错误，可能会导致他们收到一个不祥的Ytepka协会令牌。

entries.name: Magic Items of the Trickster Gods
entries: Certain magic items—specifically those in which the spirits of the nine trickster gods reside—turn to dust and are destroyed as soon as they exit the tomb. These items include Obo'laka's {@item ring of protection} ({@area area 10|356|x}), Moa's {@item staff of the python} ({@area area 14|364|x}), Wongo's {@item mace of terror} ({@area area 16|36f|x}), Papazotl's {@item amulet of health} ({@area area 22|38a|x}), Nangnang's egg-shaped {@item pearl of power} ({@area area 24|398|x}), I'jin's horn-shaped {@item wand of wonder} ({@area area 35|3d0|x}), Kubazan's {@item bracers of archery} ({@area area 42|3fc|x}), Shagambi's {@item instrument of the bards} ({@area area 48|438|x}), and Unkh's {@item robe of scintillating colors} ({@area area 55|465|x}).
如果在你看来，一个玩家在扮演一个诡计多端的神的缺陷方面做得非常出色，那么神的灵魂可能会奖励该玩家的角色，允许其魔法物品存在于坟墓之外，只要该角色在离开坟墓时与该物品相适应。

entries.name: Syndra's Fate
entries: 在九神之墓中幸存下来的角色不会知道{@creature Syndra Silvane|ToA}的命运，直到他们回到尼安萨鲁港，使用{@spell scrying}等法术监视她，或者用{@spell sending}法术或类似魔法接触她。如果角色们消灭了灵魂使者，而辛德拉还活着，牧师们会迅速将她恢复到完全健康状态，角色们就可以领取他们承诺的奖励。如果辛德拉死了，但她的灵魂在阿托帕尔吞噬之前得到了救赎，她会在灵魂使者被摧毁后的一个工作日内起死回生，并履行她与队伍的协议。如果辛德拉死了，她的灵魂被吞噬了，她的尸体就会躺在那里，等待葬礼和适当的埋葬。

entries.name: Artus and the Ring of Winter
entries: {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA}不愿意与{@item Ring of Winter|ToA}分开。他有理由担心，戒指会支配和控制任何其他主人。此外，如果没有戒指，阿图斯会像普通人一样开始衰老，他想和他心爱的阿利桑达永远生活在一起。
{@creature Xandala|ToA}、哈珀人、Zhentarim和忠于Jarl Storvald的冰霜巨人不会停止对{@item Ring of Winter|ToA}的搜寻。如果人物在阿图斯的带领下回到文明社会，他们应该会在路上遇到一个或多个这样的团体。{@creature Valindra Shadowmantle|ToA}和泰伊的红袍巫师们也不会放弃强行夺取戒指的机会。

不管有没有戒指，{@creature Artus Cimber|ToA}继续等待Mezro的回归，同时寻找到达或召唤流离失所城市的方法。对他来说，没有什么比与他的妻子团聚更重要的了。对帮助阿图斯感兴趣的角色可以利用占卜法术或停工时间进行研究。他们也可以向哈珀人咨询，哈珀人可以获得可能有助于阿图斯探索的传说，但他们要求用戒指来换取他们的帮助。在哈珀斯的帮助和戒指之间，阿图斯被迫选择了后者。另外，通向Mezro的半位面的入口可能隐藏在Chult的某个地方，为一场精彩的新冒险埋下了种子。

entries.name: Dragonbait
entries: If he's with the characters when they escape from the Tomb of the Nine Gods, {@creature Dragonbait|ToA} is eager to put Omu and this adventure behind him. As long as {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA} is alive, {@creature Dragonbait|ToA} remains committed to helping his friend find the displaced city of Mezro. If Artus is dead and there's no hope of raising him, {@creature Dragonbait|ToA} opts to return to Port Nyanzaru, where he drowns his sorrows in a few casks of tej before enjoying some downtime. The saurial gives off the scent of roses as he waves farewell to the party. He eventually crosses paths with Volothamp Geddarm, and the two explorers embark on numerous adventures together.

entries.name: Omu
entries: 除非人物清除了夜蛇之窗，否则奥姆仍然在元帝的魔掌中。如果{@creature Ras Nsi|ToA}还活着，一旦死亡诅咒结束，他对这些人物就没有进一步的利用价值了。他认为他们知道的太多了，所以在他们离开城市之前，他派了一队元老去抓捕或杀死他们。如果这支队伍得到了黑蛋白冠，他们可以用这个东西换取他们的生命。

如果{@creature Fenthaza|ToA}活着，{@creature Ras Nsi|ToA}就会犯错，让她负责派去杀这些人物的队伍，而她会向党提供一个交易。如果角色们同意杀死{@creature Ras Nsi|ToA}，他们就可以自由行动，并保留他们从岩浆中获取的任何财宝，但黑蛋白冠除外，{@creature Fenthaza|ToA}坚持要立即将其交给她。如果他们顺利地击败了{@creature Ras Nsi|ToA}，{@creature Fenthaza|ToA}就会履行她的协议。如果他们从窗格中走出来时被削弱了，她会试图摧毁他们。
Mwaxanaré公主想恢复Omu昔日的荣光，并在那里建立一个新的王国。有了Ch'gakare的头骨圣杯，她可以赢得渴望回归旧日的Chultans的支持。然而，尼安扎鲁港的商人王子们并不愿意支持她的主张，而元老们也不会贸然放弃奥木。Mwaxanaré的梦想可能需要多年才能实现，如果它真的实现的话。

entries.name: Red Wizards of Thay
entries: 灵魂使者被摧毁的消息让{@creature Valindra Shadowmantle|ToA}很恼火。她利用她的{@spell teleportation circle}，回到了泰伊，并通知萨斯-谭，她在楚尔特的任务已经失败。萨斯-塔姆被党的干扰所激怒，派出了新的特工和强大的亡灵来监视这些角色，了解他们的弱点，并（最终）处理掉他们。如果人物与哈珀人或赞塔林人有友好关系，为这一派别工作的间谍就会知道红袍巫师的阴谋，并可以警告人物。

entries.name: Acererak the Eternal
entries: {@creature Acererak|ToA}将他的法器隐藏起来，无论是神还是法术都无法得知其位置。如果他的肉体被摧毁，{@creature Acererak|ToA}会在{@dice 1d10}天后在他的法器旁边复原。大主教并不急于为他的战败者报仇。他更喜欢让时间--他最强大的盟友--杀死冒险者。一旦他们死了，他就开始让他们的后代生活得很痛苦。

entries.name: More Adventures
entries: This concludes {@i Tomb of Annihilation}. Space limitations preclude us from exploring Chult in its entirety, but you can create your own Chult-based adventures and publish them at the Dungeon Masters Guild ({@link www.dmsguild.com|https://www.dmsguild.com}).

data.name: Appendix A: Character Backgrounds
entries: 在角色创建过程中，玩家可以在你的同意下为他们的角色选择以下背景。这些背景适合于任何与发现和探索异国文化和失落文明有关的角色或活动。

items: {@background Anthropologist|ToA}
{@background Archaeologist|ToA}

data.name: Appendix B: Random Encounters
entries: 随机遭遇可能发生在尼安扎鲁港、楚尔特的荒野和奥木。这样的遭遇为冒险增加了神秘感和气氛，甚至还能通过绞碎玩家的资源来增加紧张感。随机遭遇最好是在游戏环节中出现冷场时，或者在你的玩家看起来不耐烦时使用。建议每节课不要超过一到两个，因为过度使用随机遭遇会使冒险变得枯燥，并导致玩家失去对故事的关注。

entries.name: Port Nyanzaru Encounters
entries: 即使没有随机遭遇，尼安萨鲁港也有很多事情要做，但如果角色花时间探索这个城市，一些随机事件可以帮助把这种体验带入生活。在游戏时间内，每天滚动三次D20，每天上午、下午和晚上或夜间检查是否有遭遇。掷出16或更高的分数时，就会发生遭遇战。掷骰子并检查尼安萨鲁港的遭遇表，以确定人物遇到的情况，或者干脆选择一个你喜欢的遭遇。

entries.caption: Port Nyanzaru Encounters
rows: 一只鹦鹉在一个随机人物的头上拉屎。
在港口附近，一个在仓库运河中拖船的{@creature ankylosaurus}大发雷霆，必须安抚、克制或杀死。
当一个鬼鬼祟祟的年轻人({@creature commoner})冲过人物时，一个商人喊道："停下！小偷！"。如果小偷被抓住了，感激的商人可以把人物介绍给一个商人王子，或者为他们提供一个其他的帮助。

A drunk foreign sailor (unarmored {@creature veteran}) is loudly trying to pick a fight with three local {@creature commoner||commoners}, who are clearly no match for the lout. If the characters intervene, the grateful locals become a reliable source of information about Port Nyanzaru, but the sailor and his shipmates ambush the characters elsewhere in the city later on.
一个乞丐({@creature commoner})抓住一个角色的胳膊，喊道："紫禁城下的古人诞生了一个可怕的新神! 蛇人知道! 他们知道！" 然后他跌跌撞撞地走到人群中。路人告诉冒险家们不要理会这个乞丐，他的预言大多数时候都是错误的。

Alarm horns declare that undead are attacking Malar's Throat. Mercenaries keep the monsters out of the city proper, but people are trapped in the temple of Tymora and besieged by 2d6 {@creature zombie||zombies} and 2d6 {@creature skeleton||skeletons} led by a {@creature ghoul}. If the characters defeat the undead, the temple rewards them with 5 gallons of tej and a {@item potion of healing}.

Shouts of "Look out!" give a character a brief warning as a water barrel, building stone, or other heavy weight crashes down. The character must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be struck, taking 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage. Any character who succeeds on a DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check spots a disguised {@creature yuan-ti pureblood} slinking away from the scene.
一个{@creature tabaxi minstrel|ToA}向其中一个角色索要一块金币，作为她赌博的赌注，承诺会还钱。如果该人物同意，tabaxi第二天就会兑现她的承诺，归还一个装有10金币的小袋子。
一个小偷({@creature spy})试图偷窃其中一个人物的口袋。
这些人物遇到了{@creature Volothamp "Volo" Geddarm|toa|Volothamp Geddarm}，他正在给城里的一个商人王子送他的新书。有{@chance 50|50 percent}的机会，沃罗喝醉了。
角色们遇到了一个有副任务的NPC

entries.name: Wilderness Encounters
entries: 当人物在野外探险或露营时，在每天的游戏时间内滚动三次D20，在每天上午、下午和晚上或夜间检查是否有遭遇战。掷出16或更高的分数时，就会发生遭遇战。掷出百分数骰子，并检查荒野遭遇表，看是否有适合人物所在的地形。在确定了角色遇到的情况后，你可以使用本附录后面介绍的信息，将遇到的情况生动化。
丘特的地图上有标记为亡灵领地（较小或较大）的区域。荒野奇遇表有单独的栏目，你在确定在这些亡灵出没的地区或没有亡灵的地区的奇遇时应该使用。
如果你的玩家厌倦了随机遭遇，可以让他们在掷出18或更高的分数时发生，或者只掷出20分，从而使这种遭遇不那么常见。你也可以让玩家通过叙述的方式来避免简单的遭遇，或者你可以增加简单遭遇的难度来保持它们的刺激性。使遭遇战更具挑战性的一个方法是让它触发第二个随机遭遇战。例如，与地精的战斗可能会吸引附近的食尸鬼或恐龙群。你也可以通过让怪物在失去战术优势或大部分命中率时逃跑来缩短遭遇战。

Random encounters aren't tailored to characters of a particular level. If the characters encounter hostile creatures beyond their ability to defeat, give them opportunities to run, hide, negotiate, or otherwise avoid certain death. You can also have other creatures arrive and provide a distraction that the characters can use to make their escape. For example, if a character needs to make a crucial ability check or saving throw, you can have a {@creature chwinga|ToA} appear, cast {@spell guidance} or {@spell resistance} on the character, and then disappear on its next turn.

entries.caption: Wilderness Jungle Greater Undead Chance - Low
rows: 荒野丛林大亡灵遭遇战

entries.name: Aarakocra
entries: Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 15 or higher spots 1d4+1 {@creature aarakocra} flying overhead. These creatures are scouts from Kir Sabal or another aerie. They observe the party from a safe distance but don't approach unless the characters demonstrate peaceful intentions. The bird folk are friendly and can point characters in the direction of nearby landmarks.

entries.name: Albino Dwarves
entries: The characters are ambushed by 1d4+3 {@creature albino dwarf warrior|ToA|albino dwarf warriors} that attack from hidden burrows. Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 13 or higher spots the dwarves, but all others are {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}. The dwarves knock characters out rather than killing them, stealing food, water, and gear from those rendered unconscious. They break off their attack if any character speaks Dwarvish to them or demonstrates peaceful intentions.

entries.name: Aldani
entries: The characters are shadowed by 1d4 {@creature Aldani (Lobsterfolk)|toa|aldani}, which are noticed by any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 12 or higher. The aldani don't communicate with others unless they must, and they won't fight unless the characters refuse to take a bribe to leave the area. The aldani will aid the characters only if they're offered something of great value in return-for example, an offer to drive off a pack of predatory dinosaurs encroaching on their territory.

entries.name: Almiraj
entries: Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 12 or higher spots 1d6 {@creature almiraj|ToA} 60 feet away. The almiraj run from any creature that they can see within 30 feet of them. Any character who successfully traps an almiraj can use an action to make a DC 14 Wisdom (Animal Handling) check. If the check succeeds, the almiraj becomes calm and doesn't attack the character or run away unless it feels threatened or is harmed.

entries.name: Apes
entries: 角色们偶然发现2D4{@creature ape||apes}正在享用一些美味的水果。猿猴感到威胁，并表现出保卫食物的迹象。如果角色立即慢慢后退，猿猴除了做出威胁性的展示外，什么也不做。否则，它们就会攻击。

entries.name: Artus Cimber
entries: {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA} (with or without his saurial traveling companion, {@creature Dragonbait|ToA}) can be encountered almost anywhere. See appendix D for more information on these NPCs. The characters might stumble into Artus's camp in the evening, or he might walk into theirs. They could find him at the camp of another group of explorers, or telling a story to {@creature Dragonbait|ToA}. He could appear out of nowhere and use the powers of the {@item Ring of Winter|ToA} to help characters caught up in a tough encounter.

entries.name: Assassin Vines
entries: The characters unwittingly enter the hunting grounds of 1d3 {@creature assassin vine|ToA|assassin vines}. The vines are indistinguishable from normal plants and can't be spotted with Wisdom (Perception) checks. However, they draw carrion to their roots, so characters might smell a dead body nearby. Because assassin vines can move, an encounter in the evening or at night might involve the vines creeping into the characters' camp and strangling them as they sleep.

entries.name: Axe Beaks
entries: 一群1d6+3{@creature axe beak||axe beaks}的鸟儿冲过人物。角色们可以听到鸟儿们向他们冲来的声音，但在茂密的树丛中却看不到任何东西，直到斧头嘴迸发出来攻击，砍向他们能触及的任何人。

entries.name: Baboons
entries: A pack of 3d6 {@creature baboon||baboons} take umbrage at the characters' intrusion. The baboons can be distracted by tossing each of them a day's supply of food. Otherwise, they attack.

entries.name: Cache
entries: 队伍发现了一个由其他探险者留下的物资储藏处。从藏匿处无法判断留下这些东西的人是还活着并回来取，还是死了。掷一个D20，然后参考藏匿处表格，以确定角色的发现。

entries.caption: Cache
rows: 雨水捕捉器和混乱套件
两个人的帐篷和1d4x治疗师套装
2个帐篷，折叠式野营桌，和4个野营凳子

entries.name: Cannibals
entries: Chultan食人族在丛林中成群结队地游荡，杀死并吃掉僵尸，同时避开更快、更危险的亡灵。被他们的神抛弃后，食人族转向对夜蛇丹达的崇拜，向{@creature Ras Nsi|ToA}进贡，以换取他的青睐和保护。他们在额头上画了一个蓝色的三角形（（%%）的标志），以证明他们的虔诚，并且众所周知，他们会冒险进入奥姆（Omu）进行狩猎并交付贡品。

If this encounter occurs during the day, the characters spot 3d6 {@creature tribal warrior||tribal warriors} feeding on the rotting remains of a dismembered zombie. If the characters remain quiet and keep their distance, they can move away without being noticed by the cannibals.

If this encounter occurs at night, 3d6 {@creature tribal warrior||tribal warriors} try to sneak into the adventurers' camp and murder them. Any character on guard is warned of the attack with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Perception) check.

entries.name: Chwinga
entries: A {@creature chwinga|ToA} takes an interest in the characters. It attempts to steal something valuable from an unguarded pack or canoe, but is noticed by any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 17 or higher. The chwinga always leaves something else in exchange: a pretty shell, a handful of nuts, or an uncut gemstone (10 gp).

entries.name: Crocodiles
entries: Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 12 or higher sees and hears 1d4+1 {@creature crocodile||crocodiles} moments before they attack; all other characters are {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}. A crocodile can capsize a canoe and throw its occupants into the water by using its action and succeeding on a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check.

entries.name: Cyclops
entries: 一只{@creature cyclops}正朝着它在鳄龟湾附近的家出发。它并不是在寻找一场战斗，但任何突然的举动或人物的敌意都可能引发一场战斗。独眼巨人对罗湖周围的地区和恐惧谷的西端相当熟悉，它在这些地区从未见过像奥姆这样的东西。
在宝物掉落表上滚动两次，看看独眼巨人有什么宝物，如果有的话。

entries.caption: Treasure Drops
rows: 一张粗略的地图，画在一张被鞣制的恐龙皮上，显示出通往尼安萨鲁港的路线以及随机确定的地标或巢穴的位置（250GP）。
{@dice 1d4}宝石(每颗10gp)，装在一个小袋子里
一枚镶嵌着电子琴的孔雀石戒指（50戈比）
一个用阿拉科克拉的刻纹翼骨制成的空塞瓶（5戈比）
一个装有{@dice 1d10}银色箭矢的腐烂的箭筒
一个矮人拳头大小的金块(50 gp)
一瓶有塞的{@item Serpent Venom}的小瓶
一个印有三角龙标志的铁质信物（Ytepka协会的标志），在尼安萨鲁港价值50金币。
一瓶有塞的{@item Wyvern poison}的小瓶
一个有塞子的木管，里面装有{@dice 1d4}宝石(每颗50gp)
一个小型玛瑙球，表面刻有迷宫般的图案（75GP），可作为奥术或德鲁伊的焦点。
一个由涂色木头制成的巴蒂里妖精面具，上面镶嵌着九颗宝石（每颗10戈比）。
一把断了一根弦的琵琶(35GP)
一把极好的锁（50戈比），需要成功通过DC20的灵巧检查才能用盗贼工具撬开（锁的钥匙不见了）。

entries.name: Dinosaurs
entries: 遇到 "小白脸 "在楚尔特很常见，但并不是所有这样的生物都是有敌意的。

entries.name: Allosaurus
entries: The party's scent attracts 1d3 {@creature Allosaurus||allosauruses}, which appear 100 yards away when the characters first notice them. Any character who succeeds on a DC 15 Wisdom (Survival) check can find a safe refuge (a high branch, a small crevice, a hollow log, and so forth) that the predators can't reach or enter.

entries.name: Ankylosaurus
entries: An ornery {@creature ankylosaurus} is gorging on plants, but it attacks any characters who disturb it.

entries.name: Brontosaurus
entries: 一只孤独的{@creature brontosaurus|VGM}蹒跚地走向人物，对他们的存在视而不见。虽然它可能会踩到那些没有让开的角色，但它只在自卫的情况下进行战斗。

entries.name: Deinonychus
entries: A wild {@creature boar} races across the party's path, followed closely by a hunting pack of 1d4+2 {@creature Deinonychus|vgm|deinonychuses}. The predators decide the characters are more interesting prey.

entries.name: Dimetrodon
entries: A pack of 2d6 {@creature dimetrodon|VGM|dimetrodons} are spotted along a sunny riverbank or on rocks above the water. Roll any die. On an odd result, the dimetrodons take no notice of the characters; on an even result, they're hungry and attack at the slightest provocation, or if the characters approach within 100 feet of them.

entries.name: Hadrosaurus
entries: A herd of 3d6 {@creature Hadrosaurus|vgm|hadrosauruses} are grazing nearby, with 1d6 noncombatant young among them. The adults don't attack unless they're attacked or antagonized. The young are Small beasts that can be sold to {@creature Ifan Talro'a|ToA} in Port Nyanzaru for 50 gp each, or for 100 gp if a character succeeds on a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check to negotiate the price. The young dinosaurs are easy to handle if separated from their parents, but the adults fight if their young are captured.

entries.name: Plesiosaurus
entries: 两只{@creature Plesiosaurus||plesiosauruses}正在争夺一只死去的巨型章鱼。如果人物在河上，这些生物会在300英尺的距离上被发现，然后它们就会气势汹汹地吼叫，并移动着攻击队伍。要把独木舟划到河岸边的安全地点，独木舟上的一个角色必须在DC13力量（竞技）检查中取得成功，独木舟上的其他角色则使用帮助动作。没有到达河岸的独木舟会被爬行动物翻转并摧毁，然后它们会攻击水中的游泳者。

entries.name: Pteranodon
entries: A flock of 2d6 {@creature pteranodon||pteranodons} is spotted overhead. They keep their distance and attack only if threatened.

entries.name: Quetzalcoatlus
entries: A flight of 1d4+1 {@creature Quetzalcoatlus|vgm|quetzalcoatluses} is spotted overhead. They keep their distance and attack only if threatened.

entries.name: Stegosaurus
entries: This lone {@creature stegosaurus|VGM} is in a genial mood. It approaches the characters out of curiosity, but anyone who touches it triggers a swipe from its tail.

entries.name: Triceratops
entries: A {@creature triceratops} that appears to be grazing alone is actually a mother with a nearby nest containing one noncombatant hatchling and two unhatched eggs. The mother eyes the characters suspiciously but doesn't attack unless they position themselves between her and the nest. {@creature Ifan Talro'a|ToA} in Port Nyanzaru offers 50 gp for an intact triceratops egg or hatchling, or a character can talk him up to 150 gp with a successful DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check.

entries.name: Tyrannosaurus
entries: 人物在300码外发现一个{@creature tyrannosaurus rex}。这只饥饿的巨兽有{@chance 50|50 percent}的机会在与剑龙、三角龙、一对巨大的收缩蛇、一只巨猿或一群食尸鬼和僵尸战斗。这些生物都不会自愿与队伍合作，但它们的存在可能会削弱暴龙的力量，使角色有机会杀死它。
如果角色保持距离，并在DC15的团体灵巧（隐身）检查中取得成功，就可以避免与暴龙的遭遇。如果任何角色接受过生存技能的训练，那么所有角色的检定都具有优势。

entries.name: Velociraptor
entries: A pack of 3d6 {@creature velociraptor|VGM|velociraptors} burst out from behind cover and attack. Make a single Dexterity (Stealth) check for the dinosaurs, with advantage. Any character whose passive Wisdom (Perception) score equals or exceeds the velociraptors' check result is not {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

entries.name: Dragon, Faerie
entries: An invisible green {@b faerie dragon} takes an interest in the adventurers and follows them for a while. If the characters are in good spirits, the tiny dragon plays harmless pranks on them during the party's next short or long rest. If the characters are not angered by this trickery, the dragon appears and truthfully answers three of their questions before bidding the party farewell. If the characters seem dour or mean, or if the faerie dragon's pranks sour them, it flutters off without providing any sort of aid.
这条精灵龙最近访问了奥姆，知道了监视这座城市的邪恶石像鬼和 "蛇人"。它还知道关于附近其他地标或地点的事情，由你决定。

entries.name: Dragon, Red
entries: If the characters are within 50 miles of Wyrmheart Mine (see chapter 2), they see the {@creature young red dragon} known as Tzindelor or Tinder circling over that location. If they're farther away, they see her flying in the direction of the mine. The dragon ignores the characters unless they do something to attract her attention.

entries.name: Eblis
entries: If the characters are on the move when this encounter occurs, they stumble across 1d4+1 {@creature eblis|ToA} living in reed huts built on stilts above a swampy marsh or pond. The eblis attack wounded or weak-looking characters but offer to trade information for precious gemstones if faced with a strong, well-armed group. For 50 gp worth of gems, they point the adventurers in the direction of nearby landmarks. If the characters follow these directions, they have advantage on checks made to reach those landmarks (see {@i "Navigation"}). If the characters defeat the eblis and search the huts, roll three times on the Treasure Drops table to determine what, if anything, the eblis have stashed in their homes.
如果这个遭遇发生在队伍扎营的时候，埃布利斯人就会潜入营地，并试图拖走一个角色。

entries.name: Emerald Enclave
entries: 角色们会遇到一队翡翠飞地的侦察兵，或者偶然发现他们的一个前哨。选择最适合环境和地点的遭遇。

entries.name: Enclave Scouts
entries: The party meets 1d4+1 members of the Emerald Enclave working to rid the jungle of its undead menace. The group works with a {@creature priest} of Mielikki, but all other members are {@creature scout||scouts}. If one of the adventurers has died recently, you can use this encounter to introduce a new character-either a member of the Emerald Enclave, someone the scouts have rescued, or a character who hired the scouts as guides.
侦察员愿意在平等的基础上与非邪恶的一方交换信息。角色也可以说服侦察兵加入他们的队伍，最长时间为3天，方法是通过DC12的团体魅力（劝说）检查成功。翡翠飞地的侦察兵有足够的食物和水来滋养自己，每个侦察兵都有一个探险者的背包。牧师携带一个牧师包。

entries.name: Enclave Outpost
entries: 任何被动智慧（感知）得分在13分以上的角色都会在树上发现一个木制平台。平台离地面有2d6×5英尺高，需要成功进行DC12力量（运动）检查才能爬上树。这个平台是10英尺见方的，足够结实，可以支撑六个人物和他们的装备。

entries.name: Explorer, Dead
entries: 丘特散布着那些被其恐怖所害的人的尸体和骨头。当角色们发现一个这样的受害者时，滚动一个D20，并参考死亡探险家表来决定他们发现了什么。然后在宝物掉落表上滚动一次，看看在遗体上或附近能找到什么，如果有的话。

entries.caption: Dead Explorers
rows: 一个死去的半身人的臃肿尸体，身上插满了小箭，挂在树藤上。(半身人闯入了格陵兰的圣地，尸体被挂在这里以示警告）。
一个没有盔甲的人形生物的骨头，被藤蔓捆绑在一棵树上。(这个探险家被巴蒂里的地精抓住了，被浇上了蜂蜜，然后被饥饿的昆虫吞食。）
一个没有盔甲的矮人的碎尸，显示出她被横冲直撞的恐龙踩死的痕迹。
一个人形生物的啃咬和烧焦的骨头。(这个不幸的人被他饥饿的、发烧的同伴们谋杀并吃掉了）。
一个半精灵的残缺不全的尸体，似乎是被殴打致死。(她是被翼手党从高空扔下来的）。
一个矮人的散落的骨头，在被吞噬之前被撕成了碎片。(一群狩猎的迅猛龙把这个矮人干掉了）。
一个精灵的肿胀、紫色的尸体，几天前才被毒蛇咬死。
一具新鲜的人类尸体被塞进一棵空心树里。 (Girallons计划稍后回来吞噬它。)
一个人形物体的骨架坐在一个折叠式营地凳子上，瘦骨嶙峋的双手紧握着刀叉。
侏儒的干瘪外壳，被巨大的蜘蛛网包裹着。
人类的尸体--从腰部往上。迹象表明，这位探险家在被暴龙咬成两半后，爬行了相当长的距离。(在尸体上发现的火焰拳章表明，它是戴尔斯的奥诺万四世勋爵。)
一个烧焦的精灵的骨架在一个烧焦的缢杀蛇的骨架里面。(两者都是被闪电法术杀死的）。
一只巨大的青蛙的腐烂的身体，背上有一把短剑的剑身探出。(如果切开青蛙，会发现里面有一具半身人的部分消化的尸体）。
一个Tabaxi摊在地上，但它的四肢和头部被从躯干上切断，并以错误的排列方式被粗暴地缝合在一起。
一个半兽人被一只三角龙的断角钉在一棵巨大的树上。
一个地精，被吐在一个烧毁的火坑上，被彻底煮过头了，但没有被吃掉。(地精的武器和工具散落在迅猛龙的足迹中）。
一个无头的人形，倒挂在一棵树上，身上对称地插着六根巴蒂里地精长矛。(从长袍来看，这是一个红袍巫师，头部不知所踪）。
一个小精灵，在离地面40英尺的树枝上保持平衡，胳膊和腿向下悬空。(压在身体和树枝之间的一张纸条解释说，小精灵爬到树上是为了躲避一只徘徊的异特龙，但又害怕得不敢下来。）
一个戴着火焰拳头式头盔的人类的腐烂遗体，他的腿被打断了。(他屈服于一只精灵龙的极乐呼吸武器，踏下了悬崖。一个同伴试图把他抬回贝鲁安堡，但这个战士在途中死亡）。
一个侏儒，她的盔甲和胸部有六个大洞。（一只剑龙用尾巴一扫，正中她的下怀）。

entries.name: Explorers
entries: The party runs into another band of explorers, consisting of a {@creature mage}, a {@creature priest}, a {@creature scout}, and 1d6 {@creature tribal warrior||tribal warriors}. Roll a d6 on the table below to determine the group's situation.

entries.caption: Explorer Table
rows: 探险家们迷路了，也饿了。
探险者状况良好，但被火牛、食尸鬼、哥布林或grungs（见本附录中的相应条目）积极追捕。
探险家们都很健康，朝着最近的地标走去，打算探索一下。
探险者们身体健康，正在返回尼安扎鲁港休息和补给。

entries.name: Firenewts
entries: 轻型火牛巡逻队由1d4{@creature firenewt warrior|VGM|firenewt warriors}骑在{@creature giant strider|VGM|giant striders}上组成。一支重型巡逻队由2d4只{@creature firenewt warrior|VGM|firenewt warriors}和一只{@creature firenewt warlock of Imix|VGM}组成，都骑在{@creature giant strider|VGM|giant striders}上。所有这些生物的统计数字都出现在附录D中。火蝾螈总是以击倒敌人为目的进行最后一击，然后将其带回生物的洞穴巢穴进行折磨和吃掉。
{@b Note}: 根据需要调整巨人黾的数量

entries.name: Flail Snail
entries: Characters spot the slimy trail of a {@creature flail snail|VGM}. If they wish to follow it, a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Survival) check correctly deduces which direction the snail was traveling.

entries.name: Flaming Fist
entries: The soldiers of the Flaming Fist know the dangers of Chult better than most, and they don't take the wilderness lightly. A typical patrol is made up of a {@creature knight} or {@creature veteran} leading an {@creature acolyte}, a {@creature scout}, and 2d6 {@creature guard||guards}- and is sometimes accompanied by 1d4 {@creature Deinonychus|vgm|deinonychuses} trained to fight and hunt alongside their handlers. The Flaming Fist is friendly and helpful toward adventurers possessing a charter of exploration issued by Commander {@creature Liara Portyr|ToA} of Fort Beluarian. If the party has no such document, the patrol tries to confiscate the adventurers' critical gear and advises them to replace it at Fort Beluarian-and to obtain a proper charter while they're at it.

entries.name: Flying Monkeys
entries: 翅膀的声音预示着3d6{@creature flying monkey|ToA|flying monkeys}的到来，它们在一波又一波的手脚抓捕中扑向冒险者。每个角色都必须在DC12的灵巧救赎上取得成功，否则就会被毛茸茸的盗贼夺走一件有用的装备。如果这个遭遇发生在姆巴拉附近（见第2章），这些猴子是绿袍人的仆人（1%）。
这些善于交际的生物对人类很好奇，而且对人类几乎没有恐惧。一只被成功抓住的飞猴，被网住的飞猴，或者以其他方式被阻止逃跑的飞猴，可以被一个精通动物处理的角色训练成简单的技巧，他每天花几个小时与猴子一起工作。在1周后，该角色进行DC10智慧（动物处理）检查。如果成功，飞猴将学会按指令表演一个简单的戏法（例如取一个特定的物体或随着音乐跳舞）。一只猴子最多可以学习1d6个技巧，每周可以被教授一个技巧。

entries.name: Flying Snakes
entries: {@b Roll a die.} On an even result, the party encounters a single {@creature flying snake}. On an odd result, the characters encounter 2d6 {@creature flying snake||flying snakes}. These snakes attack only when threatened. A flying snake that is successfully grappled can be stuffed in a sack or other soft container. After 1 hour of confinement, the snake settles down. A character who succeeds on a DC 13 Wisdom (Animal Handling) check can remove a calm snake from the container without causing it to attack or fly away.

Characters can sell captured flying snakes to {@creature Ifan Talro'a|ToA} in Port Nyanzaru. He offers 25 gp for each snake, but a character who succeeds on a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check can talk him up to 50 gp.

entries.name: Frost Giants
entries: The characters hear the sound of huge creatures stomping through the wilderness. If they follow the noise, they encounter a search party of three {@creature frost giant||frost giants} accompanied by 1d2 {@creature winter wolf||winter wolves}. For each such encounter, there is a {@chance 20|20 percent} chance that this is {@creature Drufi|ToA}'s search party (see {@i "Hvalspyd"}).
冰霜巨人主要关心的是如何找到{@item Ring of Winter|ToA}，他们可能会帮助那些能够提供有用信息的角色。他们会立即攻击那些隐瞒信息的角色，或者威胁要将巨人的存在透露给火焰之拳的角色。冰霜巨人在狩猎时不会携带任何宝物。

entries.name: Giant Boars
entries: 人物看到并听到1d4+1{@creature giant boar||giant boars}在他们前面觅食。绕过野猪以防止它们冲锋，需要成功地进行DC12群体灵巧（隐形）检查。

entries.name: Giant Crocodile
entries: Before it rises out of the water, make a Dexterity (Stealth) check for the {@creature giant crocodile}. Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score less than the check result is {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} when the monstrous creature attacks.

entries.name: Giant Frogs
entries: These 2d6 {@creature giant frog||giant frogs} have come together in hunger and try to eat everything that crosses their path. The characters have plenty of warning as the amphibians hop noisily toward them.

entries.name: Giant Lizards
entries: The characters encounter 1d6 {@creature giant lizard||giant lizards} sunning themselves on warm rocks. The lizards pose no threat unless they're attacked, and they're too set in their ways to be trained as pack animals.

entries.name: Giant Scorpions
entries: Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 11 or higher spots 1d3 {@creature giant scorpion||giant scorpions} moments before they emerge from hiding and attack. At the end of the encounter, any character damaged by a giant scorpion must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become infected with {@disease shivering sickness|toa} (see {@i "Diseases"}).

entries.name: Giant Snapping Turtle
entries: The characters spot a {@creature giant snapping turtle|ToA} sunning itself on the shore. The turtle attacks any character it can see within 30 feet of it.

entries.name: Giant Wasps
entries: A droning sound announces the presence of 1d6 {@creature giant wasp||giant wasps} before the characters see them. The wasps attack at once, ignoring heavily armored targets in favor of those with little or no defensive protection. At the end of the encounter, any character damaged by a giant wasp must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become infected with {@disease shivering sickness|toa} (see {@i "Diseases"}).

entries.name: Girallons
entries: 两个（0%）挂在树上，栖息在岩石上，或者在摇摇欲坠的、被藤蔓覆盖的废墟之间伐木。角色们会自动发现他们，如果他们撤退并在DC13团体灵巧（隐身）检查中成功，就可以避免遭遇敌意。
如果角色们打败了长颈鹿或者把它们吓跑了，对该地区进行搜索就会发现一个隐藏的藏宝处，通过在藏宝处表上滚动来确定。长颈鹿还可能在藏匿处附近藏有一些宝物；在宝物掉落表上滚动一次，以确定在搜索该地区后能发现什么（如果有的话）。

entries.name: Goblins
entries: 一个典型的巴蒂里巡逻队或狩猎队由一个{@creature goblin boss}带领2d6+3{@creature goblin||goblins}的人组成，他们都戴着涂有油漆的木质面具。他们在熟悉的地区悄悄地移动，很少在他们的主场之外活动。巴蒂里人喜欢在夜间狩猎，白天则埋伏在低洼处。

A night encounter with Batiri goblins involves an attack on the characters' camp. Each party member standing watch must attempt a DC 16 Wisdom (Perception) check, made with disadvantage because of the noise of the jungle at night. On a success, a character detects the goblins moving into attack positions and can rouse the rest of the party. If no one on watch succeeds on the check, all the characters are {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.
如果这个遭遇发生在人物白天旅行的时候，让每个党员进行DC 16智慧（感知或生存）检查，以发现伏击的迹象：不利的地形加上丛林中不正常的阴森寂静。
妖精如果被俘，就会以生命为代价。如果角色能强迫或胁迫地精囚犯发誓合作，巴蒂里将作为向导。他们有以下的附加技能。生存能力+1。

entries.name: Grungs
entries: A grung hunting party consists of 2d6 {@creature grung|VGM|grungs} led by a {@creature grung elite warrior|VGM} (see appendix D for both). If this encounter occurs while the characters are traveling, the grungs have set up an ambush in the trees. Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 14 or higher spots them just in time. All other characters are {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

If this encounter occurs while the party is camped, the grungs spotted the characters earlier in the day and have shadowed them unseen. Each character standing watch must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom (Perception) check, made with disadvantage because of the noise of the jungle at night. On a success, a character detects the encroaching grungs and can rouse the rest of the party. If no one on watch succeeds on the check, all the characters are {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.
如果角色们抓到了一只或多只青蛙，青蛙们就会提出带领角色们去寻找宝藏，以换取自由的承诺。这个 "宝藏 "离队伍现在的位置有半英里远，由一个藏宝处组成，你可以通过在藏宝处表格上滚动来随机确定。

entries.name: Jaculis
entries: Without warning, 1d6 {@creature jaculi|ToA|jaculis} launch themselves at the party from the trees. Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 14 or higher is able to react, but all others are {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

entries.name: Kamadans
entries: The party is ambushed by 1d2 {@creature kamadan|ToA|kamadans}. Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 16 or higher gets a warning of the attack, but all others are {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}. Characters who prevail against the kamadans can search the area for their lair, finding it with a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Survival) check.
一个卡马丹的巢穴有可能包含1d3个非战斗性的幼崽，大小和家猫一样。他们的蛇还没有长出来，看起来就像豹子的幼崽。 在尼安扎鲁港，{@creature Ifan Talro'a|ToA}的人愿意为一只活的卡马丹幼崽支付150金币，但如果成功通过DC15魅力（劝说）检查，他就能得到300金币。

entries.name: Lizardfolk
entries: The characters encounter {@dice 2d4} {@creature lizardfolk} and a {@creature lizardfolk shaman}. These lizardfolk belong to a tribe or kingdom in the Valley of Dread and can be appeased with food (one day's supply per lizardfolk in the group). Otherwise they attack.

entries.name: Blue Mist
entries: A bank of blue mist drifts toward the party, covering an area of 1d6 20-foot squares. Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 13 or higher notices the mist and can warn others of its approach. If the encounter occurs while the party is camped, the mist drifts through the camp at a speed of 5 feet per round. Characters who come into contact with the mist are exposed to {@disease blue mist fever|toa} (see {@i "Diseases"}).

entries.name: Magmins
entries: The characters are attacked by 2d6 {@creature magmin||magmins}, which flee if reduced to fewer than half their starting number.

entries.name: Mantraps
entries: The characters blunder into a patch of 1d4+1 {@creature mantrap|ToA|mantraps}, which are undetectable until they attack. The plants are 10 feet apart, so that only one plant attacks on the first round. The others must wait until characters maneuver within 5 feet of them.

entries.name: Mephits
entries: 人物可能会遇到{@creature magma mephit||magma mephits}、{@creature mud mephit||mud mephits}、{@creature smoke mephit||smoke mephits}或{@creature steam mephit||steam mephits}（每组出现2d6）。梅菲特不会攻击，除非它们的数量超过人物的二分之一，但它们不愿意提供帮助，除非它们自己的数量超过了。

entries.name: Night Hag
entries: One of the Sewn Sisters (see chapter 5) shadows the party while staying in the Border Ethereal. During the party's next long rest, the {@creature night hag} materializes and snatches some blood or hair from a random character before returning to the Ethereal Plane.

entries.name: Pterafolk
entries: 在天空中，1d4+2 {@creature pterafolk|ToA}观察人物的一举一动，直到他们误入危险之中。下一次随机遭遇时，翼民会利用分散注意力的机会，从空中发动攻击，向受伤的角色发射标枪，同时不参与近战。如果他们遇到坚定的抵抗，翼民就会飞走，但他们可能会重新集结，由你决定进行后续攻击。

entries.name: Rare Plant(s)
entries: 角色找到一种或多种不寻常的植物，通过在下表中掷出D6来决定。

entries.caption: Rare Plants
rows: 4d6x 生长在灌木丛中的辛达果实

entries.name: Red Wizard
entries: This group consists of a Red Wizard (LE male or female Thayan human {@creature mage}), 1d6 {@creature guard||guards}, and 1d6 {@creature skeleton||skeletons}, all answerable to {@creature Valindra Shadowmantle|ToA} (see "Heart of Ubtao,"). If this encounter occurs outside of Omu, these reinforcements are on their way to the city. If the encounter takes place in Omu, the Red Wizard is searching the city for shrines (see chapter 3). The Thayans aren't spoiling for a fight; if defeat seems inevitable, the Red Wizard surrenders and offers a crude map of Chult marking the regions occupied by undead (see map 2.1). The characters can use the map to steer clear of these regions.

entries.name: Salamander
entries: 人物看到一条{@creature salamander}在照看1d6{@creature fire snake||fire snakes}的巢穴。蝾螈对战斗没有兴趣，攻击只是为了保护自己和蛇群。

entries.name: Sea Hags
entries: The characters encounter three {@creature sea hag||sea hags} that comprise a coven. Their favorite trick is to pull a damaged or abandoned canoe onto a riverbank and pretend to be stranded or wounded explorers in need of rescue.
如果角色们击败了海妖并搜索了这个区域，那么在宝藏掉落表上滚动三次，以确定他们找到了什么，如果有的话。无论海妖有什么宝物，都被藏在一个腐烂的木箱里。

entries.name: Shambling Mound
entries: 当发生{@creature shambling mound}的遭遇时，滚动任何模具。如果结果是偶数，角色会在怪物攻击他们之前听到它在泥土中跋涉的声音。如果是奇数结果，那么这个摇摇晃晃的土堆就会潜伏在一片植被中，在那里它可以被任何被动智慧（感知）得分在15分以上的角色所注意。

entries.name: Snake, Constrictor
entries: A {@creature constrictor snake} attacks a random party member from hiding. The character targeted by the snake is {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} unless he or she has a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 12 or higher.

entries.name: Snake, Giant Constrictor
entries: A {@creature giant constrictor snake}以与缢杀蛇相同的方式从藏身处进行攻击。

entries.name: Snake, Giant Poisonous
entries: A {@creature giant poisonous snake} shoots out from the undergrowth to attack a random character. The character targeted by the snake is {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} unless he or she has a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 14 or higher.

entries.name: Spiders
entries: Giant spider webs are easily concealed in Chult's dense jungles and swamps. Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 13 or higher spots the webs in time to alert the other characters to an encounter with 1d6 {@creature giant spider||giant spiders}. Otherwise, the spiders attack with surprise when the lead party member blunders into a sticky web and becomes grappled by it (escape DC 12). Hundreds of baby giant spiders crawl through the webs, but they are harmless.

entries.name: Statue of Ubtao
entries: 任何被动智慧（感知）得分在12分以上的角色都会发现一个10英尺高的雕像，上面长满了藤蔓。雕像描绘的是一个风格化的苏丹国王--乌布托的代表。掷一个D4来决定这个雕像的特殊之处。
{@b 1.} 雕像脚下有宝物，是某个丛林生物留给它的贡品。在宝物掉落表上滚动一次，以确定找到了什么宝物。如果掷出的结果显示没有宝物，那么人物就会找到不值钱的骨质珠宝碎片。
{@b 2.}哥布林、格伦和苏怪的头骨堆积在雕像的底座周围。

{@b 3.}一个{@spell glyph of warding}被刻在了雕像上。要发现这个石刻，搜索雕像的人物必须在DC15智力（调查）检查中成功。如果任何生物接触到雕像，石刻会在以雕像为中心的20英尺半径范围内爆发出魔法能量。该区域内的每个生物都必须在DC14的灵巧救赎中成功，如果救赎失败，将受到22（5d8）的雷霆伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。雷鸣般的声音有2%的几率吸引潜伏在附近的海蜇或巨魔（见下面的 "海蜇 "和 "巨魔"）。
{@b 4.} 雕像的肚子上刻有凹槽，形成一个迷宫。任何研究这些凹槽并成功通过DC10智力测验的角色都能看到一条穿过迷宫的清晰路径。然后，该人物就被赋予了一种能力，可以在行动中施放（1%）的法术，不需要任何组件，只要用他或她的手指追踪相同的路径。一旦使用，这种能力就会消失。一旦雕像赋予了这个好处，在下一个黎明之前，它不能再这样做。

entries.name: Stirges
entries: Chult is rich in caves, ruins, and hollow logs in which stirges can hide. By day, the characters disturb 2d6 {@creature stirge||stirges} as they move through the jungle. At night, the same number of stirges descend on the party's camp.

entries.name: Su-monsters
entries: The party comes across 1d4+1 {@creature su-monster|ToA|su-monsters}. The su-monsters approach cautiously, feigning curiosity. If allowed to get close, each su-monster uses its Psychic Crush in the hope of stunning an adventurer before attacking with its bite and claws. The su-monsters flee to their treetop lairs if the fight goes against them.
苏族怪物可能在它们的一棵树上藏有宝物；在宝物掉落表上滚动一次，以确定搜索这棵树会得到什么，如果有的话。

entries.name: Swarms of Bats
entries: Ruins, hollow trees, and hidden caverns can all be homes to bats. This encounter sees the characters disturb 1d4 {@creature swarm of bats||swarms of bats} that have become unnaturally aggressive from feeding on undead flesh.

entries.name: Swarms of Insects
entries: The characters are beset by {@dice 1d4} {@creature swarm of centipedes||swarm of insects (centipedes)}. At the end of the encounter, any character damaged by a swarm must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become infected with {@disease shivering sickness|toa} (see {@i "Diseases"}).

entries.name: Swarms of Quippers
entries: This encounter indicates that 1d4 {@creature swarm of quippers||swarms of quippers} catch sight of the party, but these creatures are dangerous only if the characters are in the water with them. Creatures on the shore or in canoes are safe, but in both cases, the swarms follow the characters until they're out of sight and away from the water.

entries.name: Tabaxi Hunter
entries: Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 15 or higher spots a {@creature tabaxi hunter|ToA} watching the party from a vantage point 300 feet away. If the tabaxi goes unseen, it might shadow the characters for a while, then suddenly appear to help them fight off a tough encounter or warn them of danger in the vicinity.
如果这次遭遇发生在奥姆，请参阅第3章，了解在那里发现的塔巴西猎人的更多信息。

entries.name: Tiger
entries: 一只{@creature tiger}卧薪尝胆，但会被任何被动智慧（感知）得分在16分以上的角色所注意。如果没有被发现，老虎会扑向靠近它40英尺内的角色。如果老虎失去了一半以上的命中率，它就会撤退。

entries.name: Tri-flower Frond
entries: If this encounter occurs while the characters are traveling, they wander into a patch of 1d4 {@creature tri-flower frond|ToA|tri-flower fronds} which seem like ordinary plants until they strike. If the encounter occurs while the party is camped, the plants try to infiltrate the camp, anesthetize characters with their orange blossoms, then slay them with their yellow and red blossoms.

entries.name: Troll
entries: 一个饥饿的{@creature troll}从丛林里冲出来，打算吃掉这些人物。

entries.name: Undead
entries: 亡灵正像瘟疫一样在楚尔特的丛林中蔓延。翡翠飞地、高塔骑士团和火焰之拳都在采取措施遏制这一威胁，但他们迄今为止的努力都没有成功。

entries.name: Ghouls
entries: Any character with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 12 or higher hears and smells a ghoul pack approaching, consisting of 2d6 {@creature ghoul||ghouls} led by a {@creature ghast}. The ghast has a blue triangle tattooed on its forehead-an indicator that it once served {@creature Ras Nsi|ToA}.

entries.name: Skeletons
entries: The characters come across 3d6 {@creature skeleton||skeletons}. If the encounter occurs while the party is traveling, the skeletons are either lying on the ground or buried under it, ready to spring up when wayward explorers pass by. If the party is camped, the skeletons wander into the camp and attack.

entries.name: Specter
entries: The evil remnant of a dead explorer has become a {@creature specter} that attacks the party. The explorer's body can be found with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Survival) check. If the characters locate the body, see "Explorer, Dead" earlier in this section to determine what they find.

entries.name: Wight
entries: The characters encounter a {@creature wight} that has lurked in the Chultan jungle since before the Spellplague. It harbors an eternal hatred for Chultans and everything related to Ubtao. If the party includes any Chultans or any character wearing the holy symbol of Ubtao, the wight attacks those characters in preference to other targets.

entries.name: Zombies
entries: 角色们在空气中捕捉到死亡的气息，并听到亡灵在丛林中蹒跚而行。
在下面的表格中滚动，以决定出现什么。

entries.name: Vegepygmies
entries: 人物与1d4个{@creature vegepygmy|VGM|vegepygmies}相交，每个人都骑在一个{@creature thorny|VGM}上（见附录D的内容）。这些vegepygmy猎人已经远离了他们的部落。如果寡不敌众，他们就会逃跑，否则就会攻击。

entries.name: Wereboar
entries: 一个伪装成苏丹牧师的{@creature wereboar}对侵犯其领土的探险者不屑一顾，要求人物回头。它的脖子上挂着一个木制的Ubtao圣物标志（一个刻在圆盘上的迷宫式图案）。狼人可能守卫着乌布托的神殿、乌卡树林，或用作巢穴的山洞。该生物的巢穴中可能还有宝物；在宝物掉落表上滚动三次，以确定搜索狼人的巢穴会得到什么，如果有的话。

entries.name: Weretiger
entries: 一个人形的{@creature weretiger}提议护送队伍通过一段特别危险的荒野。它没有不可告人的目的，也不要求报酬。如果人物接受了它的帮助，在狼虎与他们在一起的时候，他们不会有任何敌对的随机遭遇。它在陪伴队伍24小时后离开，或者在到达它不想探索的地方时离开，包括奥姆、南加罗尔或奥罗隆加。

entries.name: Winterscape
entries: 角色们偶然发现了一个奇妙的景象：一个半径为120英尺的冬季天气球体。为了赶走一些怪物，{@creature Artus Cimber|ToA}用{@item Ring of Winter|ToA}创造了这个球体。球体内的所有植物和表面都覆盖着闪闪发光的冰和霜，球体内的温度是刺骨的华氏30度。这个效果是由神器创造的，不能被驱散。

entries.name: Yellow Musk Creeper and Zombies
entries: The characters pass close to a ruin inhabited by 3d6 {@creature yellow musk zombie|ToA|yellow musk zombies}. The zombies might be spread across the area or bunched together, depending on the terrain. In the heart of the ruin, a {@creature yellow musk creeper|ToA} clings to a crumbling archway, statue, or polluted well.
如果这个遭遇发生在队伍扎营的时候，僵尸会从附近的废墟中出现，攻击营地并试图将角色打晕。然后它们会把这些角色拖回黄麝香爬山虎处。

entries.name: Yuan-Ti
entries: Yuan-ti patrols consist of 1d6+1 {@creature yuan-ti pureblood||yuan-ti purebloods}, which keep their distance as they try to gather information to take back to {@creature Ras Nsi|ToA}. The yuan-ti are camouflaged, but any character who succeeds on a DC 13 Wisdom (Perception) check made with disadvantage catches sight of the serpent folk as they withdraw.

If this encounter occurs within 25 miles of Omu, the patrol is instead made up of 1d4 {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 1)||yuan-ti malisons}, and it takes a DC 14 Wisdom (Perception) check to spot them. If the characters chase after the malisons, they transform into snakes and vanish into the jungle.

entries.name: Zhentarim
entries: 一个带着(1%)宠物的Zhent{@creature assassin}带领一个{@creature priest}、2d6{@creature thug||thugs}和1d6{@creature tribal warrior||tribal warriors}穿越荒野，寻找{@creature Artus Cimber|ToA}和{@item Ring of Winter|ToA}。如果阿图斯和这些人物在一起，珍特人就会要求得到戒指，如果他们不尽快得到，就会发动攻击。否则，他们对这些人物没有什么兴趣。
在宝物掉落表上滚动一次，以确定甄子丹携带什么宝物（如果有的话）。

entries.name: Zorbos
entries: If this encounter occurs while the characters are traveling, they spot 2d6 {@creature zorbo|ToA|zorbos} in wukka trees. The creatures growl and bare their teeth if any characters approach them. If the characters act in a threatening manner, the zorbos attack.
如果这个遭遇发生在队伍扎营的时候，饥饿的佐伯斯会从周围的树上掉下来，并进行攻击。

entries.name: Omu Encounters
entries: Random encounters in Omu can take place in ruined buildings and streets, in the fetid swamps around the buildings, and in the ruined royal palace. Roll a {@dice d20} three times per day of game time, checking for encounters each morning, afternoon, and evening or night. An encounter occurs on a roll of 18 or higher. Roll percentile dice and check the Omu Encounters table for the appropriate terrain to see what the characters encounter.
下面介绍四个只在奥姆发生的随机遭遇。

entries.name: Gargoyles
entries: Perched on a cliff are 2d4 {@creature gargoyle||gargoyles} that swoop down to attack. Two of them carry a net between them. As an action, either gargoyle can use the net to make a melee weapon attack (+4 to hit) against one Small or Medium creature. If the attack hits, the gargoyles hoist the character into the air and fly off with their catch. It takes both gargoyles to lift the net if it has a creature caught in it. The gargoyles flee if reduced to half their number.

entries.name: Giant Wolf Spiders
entries: The characters are attacked by 1d6 {@creature giant wolf spider||giant wolf spiders} living in hidey-holes in the nearby ruins. A search of the spiders' lair might yield treasure; roll once on the Treasure Drops table to determine what, if anything, is found.

entries.name: King of Feathers
entries: The characters encounter the tyrannosaurus rex known as the {@creature King of Feathers|ToA}. See chapter 3 for more information on this unique beast.

entries.name: Kobolds
entries: Moving through the city or palace ruins are 1d4+1 {@creature kobold||kobolds} led by a {@creature kobold inventor|VGM}. Characters with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 12 or higher spot the kobolds, which flee if approached or attacked. The kobolds serve the kobold scale sorcerer Kakarol (see chapter 3). They might be on their way to one of the city's shrines to reset its traps, or they might be returning to their lair with a recently discovered treasure. Roll once on the Treasure Drops table to determine what, if anything, the kobolds found.

entries.caption: Omu Encounters
rows: {@area Yellow musk creeper and yellow musk zombies|5f9|x}

data.name: Appendix C: Discoveries
entries: 楚尔特是一片充满了难以言喻的奇迹和失落的宝藏的土地。冒险家们在探索半岛上未知的荒野时，将亲自发现这一点。

entries.name: Flora and Fauna
entries: 本节描述了Chult原生的不寻常的野生动物。任何精通自然技能的人物都能一眼认出这些植物或生物，并且可以通过成功的DC15智力（自然）检查来回忆其属性。如果该人物是Chult的本地人，那么这个检查是有优势的。
这里描述的野生动物可以在尼安扎鲁港和其他定居点以动植物表中列出的金额进行买卖。
Some of these things inflict the poisoned condition on a creature for an hour or more. Remember that {@spell lesser restoration} and similar magic can end that condition.

entries.name: Dancing Monkey Fruit
entries: 这种稀有的神奇水果产生的汁液足以装满一个小瓶。任何吃了跳舞猴果实或喝了它的汁液的类人都必须在DC14宪法救赎中成功，否则就会开始一段持续1分钟的滑稽舞蹈。不会中毒的类人动物对这种魔法效果免疫。
舞者必须在不离开其空间的情况下使用其所有的动作来跳舞，并且在攻击卷和灵巧蓄力上有劣势，其他生物在对其攻击卷上有优势。每次受到伤害时，舞者可以重复蓄力投掷，成功后结束对自己的影响。当舞蹈效果结束时，这个人形生物会在1小时内遭受中毒状态。

entries.name: Menga Leaves
entries: 曼加灌木的干叶可以磨碎，溶于液体，加热，然后摄取。以这种方式摄取1盎司曼加叶的生物可恢复1点生命值。在24小时内摄取超过5盎司曼加叶的生物不会获得额外的好处，并且必须在DC 11宪法救赎中成功，否则就会昏迷1小时。昏迷的生物如果在一个回合内受到至少5次伤害就会醒来。
一个健康的曼加树丛通常有2d6盎司的叶子。一旦采摘，叶子需要1天时间晾干，才能带来任何好处。

entries.name: Ryath Root
entries: 任何摄取瑞亚特根的生物都会获得2d4的临时命中率。在24小时内吃下一个以上的雷亚特根的生物必须在DC13宪法救赎中成功，否则就会在1小时内遭受中毒状态。

entries.name: Sinda Berries
entries: 这些浆果是深棕色的，有苦味。一个完整生长的辛达浆果树丛有4d6个浆果在上面生长。被摘掉所有浆果的灌木丛会在1d4个月内长出新的浆果。被采摘的浆果在24小时后会失去其新鲜度和功效。
新鲜的辛达果实可以生吃，或者碾碎后加入饮料中以减弱其苦味。一个生物如果吃了至少10个新鲜的辛达果实，在接下来的24小时内对疾病和毒药的抵抗力会有优势。

entries.name: Wildroot
entries: 将野菜根的汁液引入中毒生物的血液中（例如，将其抹在开放的伤口上），可以使该生物摆脱中毒状态。一旦以这种方式使用，野菜就会失去这种特性。

entries.name: Wukka Nuts
entries: 这些拳头大小的坚果生长在wukka树上，而wukka树是jaculi、su-monsters和zorbos的热门聚集地。摇晃武卡坚果时，会发出响声，使其外壳在10英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外10英尺范围内发出暗光。这种神奇的光在1分钟后会消失，但再次摇晃坚果会使光重新出现。如果坚果的外壳被敲开，它就会失去其魔力。

entries.name: Yahcha
entries: A yahcha (pronounced YAH-chah) is a harmless, meaty beetle about the size of a human hand, which feeds on worms and maggots. It moves slowly (walking speed 10 feet) and is easy to catch. A creature with {@disease blue mist fever|toa} that eats a raw or cooked yahcha can immediately make a saving throw with advantage against that disease (see {@i "Diseases,"}).

entries.name: Zabou
entries: 扎布菇以内脏和死树的腐烂木材为食。如果小心处理，可以采摘或连根拔起一个Zabou，而不会导致它释放孢子。如果被压碎或击中，扎布会在一个10英尺半径的范围内释放孢子。Zabou也可以被扔到30英尺远的地方，或者像手榴弹一样投掷，在撞击时释放出它的孢子云。该区域内的任何生物必须在DC 10的宪法救赎中成功，否则将被毒害1分钟。中毒的生物的皮肤会在持续时间内发痒。该生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复这个蓄力动作，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。

entries.name: Magic Items
entries: 以下物品在冒险中的不同位置出现。

items: {@item Amulet of the Black Skull|ToA}
{@item Bookmark|ToA}
{@item Ghost Lantern|ToA}
{@item Mask of the Beast|ToA}
{@item Ring of Winter|ToA}
{@item Scorpion Armor|ToA}
